## [camunda-platform-13.4.2](https://github.com/camunda/camunda-platform-helm/releases/tag/camunda-platform-13.4.2) (2026-02-05)

### Fixes

- Support lower helm cli versions by conditionally using toYamlPretty (#4978)

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->
### Release Info

Supported versions:

- Camunda applications: [8.8](https://github.com/camunda/camunda/releases?q=tag%3A8.8&expanded=true)

### Verification

For quick verification of the Helm chart integrity using [Cosign](https://docs.sigstore.dev/signing/quickstart/):

```shell
cosign verify-blob camunda-platform-13.4.2.tgz \
  --bundle "camunda-platform-13.4.2-cosign-bundle.json" \
  --certificate-identity-regexp "https://github.com/camunda/camunda-platform-helm" \
  --certificate-oidc-issuer "https://token.actions.githubusercontent.com"
```

For detailed verification instructions, check the steps in the `camunda-platform-13.4.2-cosign-verify.sh` file.
